name: The Dark Blox
description:
Welcome to the Dark Side
This theme is primarily made of black and red with a pinch of purple thrown into the mix
Require the site to be set to Dark Theme to work properly
additional_info:
after one year of nothing, here ya go
fixed a lot of coloring inconsistency and error

also added a custom scroll bar

@-moz-document domain("roblox.com") {
/*  Fade-in, blur & shadows */
.dropdown-menu {
    animation: fadein 0.5s;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 100px;
}

.roblox-popover-content.bottom .notification-stream-wrap.open {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px;
}

.chat-main {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 15px;
}
.dialog-main {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 7px #f00;
}

@keyframes blur {
    from {
        filter: blur(25px);
    }
    to {
        filter: blur(0px)
    }
}

.menu-vertical .menu-option .menu-secondary-option {
    animation: fadein 0.5s;
}

.menu-secondary-container {
    animation: fadein 0.5s;
}



#header {
    opacity: 1;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 25px;
    /*display: none;*/
}

.rbx-left-col {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px;
}

@keyframes fadein {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1
    }
}

@-moz-keyframes fadein {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1
    }
}

@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1
    }
}

@-o-keyframes fadein {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1
    }
}

@keyframes fadeout {
    from {
        opacity: 1;
    }
    to {
        opacity: 0
    }
}



/*  Adblock */
.ad,
.ad *,
.img_ad,
.ad-annotations,
#google_image_div,
#aw0,
#AdvertisingLeaderboard {
    display: inherit !important;
    filter: blur(0px);
}

.ad,
.ad *,
.img_ad,
.ad-annotations,
#google_image_div,
#aw0,
#AdvertisingLeaderboard {
    display: inherit !important;
    filter: blur(0px);
}


/*  Animations */
.chat-container.collapsed .chat-main,
.chat-main,
.dialog-container,
.dialog-container.collapsed {
    transition: height 1s
}

.chat-friend-list .chat-friend-container,
.input-group-btn .dropdown-menu li a {
    transition: box-shadow 1s
}



.game-card-container:hover {
    transition: height 1s, top 1s;
    height: 107%;
    top: 0px;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 25px
}

#navigation {
    transition: width 1s
}
}
